item.title: CVE-2021-34621|2024-09-17T01:02:00.307Z -- profilepress -- profilepress
item.description: A vulnerability in the user registration component found in the ~/src/Classes/RegistrationAuth.php file of the ProfilePress WordPress plugin made it possible for users to register on sites as an administrator. This issue affects versions 3.0.0 - 3.1.3. .
